metadata.title: CVE-2019-8907 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
do_core_note in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.35 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (stack corruption and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
libmagic1 - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python3-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2').
